subject: Solheim Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The European squad came into this week as the decided underdogs in the biennial Solheim Cup with no victories on American soil, but they took the lead by the end of the afternoon Friday.
snippet: The European squad came into this week as the decided underdogs in the biennial Solheim Cup with no victories on American soil, but they took the lead by the end of the afternoon Friday.
